fields.label: Introductory Section
fields.name: introductory_section
fields.instructions: This section will be styled differently from other content sections and will always appear at the very top of page underneath the page title.

sub_fields.label: Column Heading
sub_fields.name: column_heading
sub_fields.instructions: Place a heading above the multiple columns

sub_fields.label: Left Column Width
sub_fields.name: left_column_width
sub_fields.instructions: Set the column size for the left half column.

sub_fields.label: Right Column Width
sub_fields.name: right_column_width
sub_fields.instructions: Set the column size for the right half column.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Sets the name of the tab

sub_fields.label: Services
sub_fields.name: services
sub_fields.instructions: Select which services you would like to display on the page

sub_fields.label: Display Type
sub_fields.name: display_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select how the services should be displayed

sub_fields.label: Testimonials
sub_fields.name: testimonials
sub_fields.instructions: Select which testimonials you would like to display on the page

sub_fields.label: Display Type
sub_fields.name: display_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select how the testimonials should be displayed
